description: couple engaged in intercourse; woman twists to put her arms around man's neck; woman wears orange, red and white checked kimono; man wears purple, green, orange and white striped kimono; purple garment with green and orange birds at left edge of image; text in two areas along right edge
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: A Sumo Hold, No. 11 from Twelve Bouts in the Way of Love (Shikidō torikumi jūniban)
